pr_title: Only run enhancements if they don't already exist or are "forced"

timeline.message: Only run enhancements if they don't already exist or are "forced"

timeline.bodyText: think you can remove this one, its not used in this test
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: You can probably skip these delete steps since you have the @After method which recursively deletes the dir. If you didn't, this delete could be problematic since if the test failed it wouldn't delete the file.
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: Can remove these in this class as well
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: Is this throw serving a purpose here? Doesn't seem like what you'd expect in a successful case
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: same question for this throw, plus you can probably remove the delete below
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.message: Only run enhancements if they don't already exist or are "forced"
Move where needsRun filter runs and update tests
Always create new thumbnails for collections/admin units
Allow collections with thumbnails to have enhancments run on them

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, I would rather leave it up to the enhancement processors to decide if anything needs to be done to an object rather than do it here, which we would need to remember to update in the future if more types of derivatives are added for non-files. So I'd suggest removing this and the conditional at 119. The shortcut to jump to the original ds is probably fine to keep.
timeline.author: bbpennel
